name: Microsoft Access Lock File
summary: Learn about .LACCDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Access 2007 automatically creates LACCDB files when .ACCDB files are opened. LACCDB files have the same name as their corresponding ACCDB file and are located in the same directory. When the ACCDB files are closed, the LACCDB file is automatically deleted.
NOTE: LACCDB files serve the same purpose as .LDB files from previous versions of Access.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
